H0.text: Dutch Motor Racer Maurice Gatsonides invented which aid to racing that has become a curse to drivers. Radar Gun

H1.text: Dutch Motor Racer Maurice Gatsonides invented which aid to racing that has become a curse to drivers. Speed Camera

H2.text: Dutch Motor Racer Maurice Gatsonides invented which aid to racing that has become a curse to drivers. Tachometer

H3.text: Dutch Motor Racer Maurice Gatsonides invented which aid to racing that has become a curse to drivers. Talivan

A4.text: Today, Gatsonides' fame largely results from inventing the Gatso speed camera, a speed measuring device used today by many police forces to catch speeding drivers.
